comments: This contract includes one or more amendments. This contract was competitively sourced. This contract is a multi-year contract. This is a notice of the restatement of Contract EN57932159 dated 2012-11-15/2013-03-31. The contract was misstated for original contract value, $100,193.94, and contract end date, 2014-01-31, which omitted the option, and has been corrected.
